name: 曾貴祺
objective:
本課程目標為提升學生英文之閱讀能力與聽力。包含增加英文單字數量，科技論文文法、句型、結構等特質，及訓練聽力習慣。
This course aims to leverage up the ability of English reading and listening for students. It includes vocabulary amount increasing, grammar recognition, sentence style and organization, and listening comprehension.
schedule: 1. introduction 2-3week unit 1, 4-5 week unit 2, 6-7 week unit 3, 8 week review, 9 week mid-term  10-11 week unit 4 , 12-13 week unit 5, 14-15 week unit 6, 16-17 week unit 7, 18 week final exam
scorePolicy:
平時 and attendance 50%
mid-term 25%
final exam 25%
materials: English for Science and Technology  (東華書局)
